name: PayPal Holdings, Inc.
summary: PayPal Holdings, Inc. is a technology platform that enables digital and mobile payments on behalf of consumers and merchants worldwide. The company operates a global payment network that facilitates a number of payment solutions, including PayPal, PayPal Credit, Braintree, Venmo, Xoom, and Hyperwallet. PayPal's services allow individuals and businesses to send and receive payments, shop online, and access financial services.
